features: 🧊【Super Long Endurance and Strong Airflow】- Low/high speed level. Adjust appropriate fan speed by pressing the power button repeatedly. Two gear which can be variable speed design provides you more choices in different temperature environment.

🧊【Portable Design and Mini Size】- The foldable design makes it easy to carry and store. Besides, with the oval shape(1.3*1.3*4.7 Inches, Weight: 4.4 Oz), this rechargeable fan can hide the fan blade, small and easy to slide into your pocket and purse, with no frame design, it makes noise low to 50db that causes no bother during work.

🧊【Safety Handheld Fan】- Made in special soft material, the fan blades are very safe. If you accidentally touch the rotating blades, the fan will automatically stop and keep you safe. Featuring with adorable look, this mini fan can also be a great gift choice for your family and friends. Cute, tiny, and useful gadgets for most people in summer. Packing List: Handheld fan x 1, Charging cable x 1, User manual x 1.
🧊【Customer Service】- Nezylaf provides professional customer service before and after purchase.We offer not only Best desk fan but also superb customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pocket Size Fan -- Easy to jam into a bag to tote around for optimal cooling. Super Long Battery Life -- 15 hours cooling time in one full charge. It allows you to enjoy it all day long. 2-Stage Transformable Safety Fan -- Convertible and Flexed for infinity possibility. the fan will automatically stop and keep you safe. USB Rechargeable -- It is USB rechargeable through a regular USB socket, laptop, power bank, or car charger. Polymer battery - no power consumption for long standby time, higher battery safety
Brand Nezylaf Woking Time 9-15 hours Charging Time 1hours wind 2-Stage Transformable Safety Fan Weight 90g Dimension 114*34*32mm Battery Capacity 1800 Charging Cord Type C Charging Cord (Included)

Pocket Size small enough to jam into a bag to tote around and would be an everyday-carry-essential fan to cool you off in a hot day. Safety Ensure With special soft TPE material, the blades are very safe. If you accidentally touch the rotating blades, the soft blades will automatically stop and keep you safe. How to open the cover? Fingers open from one side What's In The Package? 1 x Mini fan 1 x User Manual 1 x USB C Cable 1 x Lanyard 2 x Sticker

Q&A Q1: Will it hurt if accidentally touch the fan blade when it’s on? A1: It doesn’t hurt and it will stop if something hits the blades. Q2: Does it come with a charger? A2: The personal fan comes with a type-c cable , but does not include a charger. Q3: Can this be carried on a plane? A3: I have taken this handheld fan on over five flights since purchasing it and have had no issues carrying it in my purse through TSA. It can also double as a power bank to charge your phone if needed, which is very convenient in airports or on long flights with masks. I now carry it with me in my purse daily. Q4:How do u turn on the portable charger? A4:Simply plug in the charging cable to the USB output and it will start charging right away. ATTENTION: 1. This mini fan's battery complies with international safety standards, and you can carry it on transportation such as airplanes and high-speed trains. 2. If the battery voltage is below 3.5V, the power bank cannot charge the phone, but the fan and flashlight can still work normally. If you encounter this situation, please fully charge the power bank before charging your phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little fan is packed with a lot of power. This little fan fits perfectly in my small purse. Easy to pack away in your carry on bag. This is perfect for those personal summers. It doesn’t take up a lot of space. This fan has two speeds and the base can be use as a stand. With the base you can position this fan in several positions. This fan doesn’t take long to recharge. The noise level is not overwhelming on the second speed. Neat way to beat those hot summer days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Loved this for my flight!! Super easy, perfect size, comes with adorable kitty stickers!I get nauseous easily on planes bc there’s never any air. This SAVED me on my flight to NY and back!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel!
reviews.reviewText: Love this little fan for travel! It keeps you cooler when in hot humid environments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product (if you can open it)
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the pink fan that’s also a power bank and it looks just like the picture - the plastic casing is sturdy and the fan works great. However, I struggled a lot to open it - that’s why I took off a star. I’m hoping the hinge loosens up with use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fan is great for anyone that has hot flashes or any other condition that cause the person to be hot. The fan can last up 12 hours with 2.5 hours of charging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We bought these for Disney (Oct 2023). I bought 4. Each one still has its charge from before we left on the trip. We used each one for I would say a total of 30 minutes each. They were great to pull out and use but stow away in a pocket or small bag. I love how the blades fold in so as to not break. We will continue to use these for sporting events and whatever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars UPDATE: (Not the) Best Fan of Its Kind!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. UPDATE 08/11/2023: So, unfortunately I had to remove 2 stars giving it 3 now instead of 5. The biggest reason for that is after using the fan for a while, the function of turning off if the blades can’t move disappears… So, for example, let’s say I have the fan running for 30 minutes while I’m sitting at my desk at work, then I put it back in my bag when I’m finished using it. If the “on” button gets pressed somehow in my bag, the fan will keep running- even if it’s completely closed and the blades can’t move. One of the biggest reasons that I purchased a new fan was because my old one would do the same thing, and when I would go to use it, it would be dead and feel really warm. The fan does everything else it’s supposed to though; it definitely has a lot of power to it and a long battery life. It really is disappointing that the “turning off when the blades can’t move” function doesn’t work though…OG 05/07/2023: The “white” fan is so cute and works really well! This is the 3rd fan like this I’ve purchased, but this is the first time I’ve had this specific fan from this specific store. The one I had previously was extremely easy to turn on, when closed, and it would stay on even in the fan was folded up and the blades couldn’t move. This fan will not stay on for longer than 2 seconds if it is closed and the blades can’t spin (shown in video). Also, the on light and charging light are different colors! Green and blue respectively. The blades stop spinning if you lightly tap it with your hand (video) , and they are made of soft, thin plastic, so they won’t cause any injuries. The fan is also amazing for hot flashes/weather! I fully charged it, then turned it on before I went to sleep. I slept for approximately 7.5 hours, and it was still running on the 2nd fastest speed when I woke up! Definitely recommend 👍🏽

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this fan. Fits in a purse and the speeds are strong.
Finally got to use this at a wedding. It works very well and has 3 speed settings. Have to be careful not to touch the blades when it’s on. Love that it’s compact in size.
Format idéal pour le sac à dos, tres efficace, je recommande.
